author: Jenna Busch
title: Four More Adam Sandler Netflix Films Are On the Way
text:
SHARE There are four more Adam Sandler Netflix film heading your way 
There are four more Adam Sandler Netflix films on the way. Sandler’s Happy Madison Productions are two films into a four film deal with the streaming service that was set down in 2014. This new deal with marks four additional films beyond the two that haven’t been released yet. The next Adam Sandler Netflix film to be released is Sandy Wexler , which will debut on April 14, 2017. Jennifer Hudson ( Dreamgirls , Hairspray Live! ) co-stars in the film about an unusual agent who is good at spotting talent. Also appearing are Judd Apatow ( Zookeeper , The Ben Stiller Show ), David Spade ( The Emperor’s New Groove , Just Shoot Me! ), Kevin James ( Kevin Can Wait , The King of Queens ) and Jane Seymour ( Somewhere In Time , Doctor Quinn, Medicine Woman ). 
“Adam Sandler one of the leading comedians in the film world, and his movies have proven to be extremely successful with our subscribers around the world,” Netflix’s chief content officer Ted Sarandos said in a statement. “We are thrilled at the opportunity to extend our partnership with Adam and his entire team at Happy Madison and keep the world laughing.” Sandler said of the deal in a statement, “Love working with Netflix and collaborating with them. I love how passionate they are about making movies and getting them out there for the whole world to see. They’ve made me feel like family and I can’t thank them enough for their support.” Sandler is known for his goofball persona in comedies like The Wedding Singer , Happy Gilmore and Little Nicky . He’s taken dramatic turns in films like Punch-Drunk Love and Spanglish . He’s also the voice of Dracula in the Hotel Transylvania animated films. So, what do you think of the idea of four more Adam Sandler Netflix films? What did you think of his first two; The Ridiculous 6 and The Do-Over ? Let us know in the comments or tweet us @ComingSoonnet .
